messages.subject: Conference registration deadline
messages.msgSnippet: Just a gentle reminder than the Live and Learn Unschooling Conference s Early Bird deadline is approaching. It s only two weeks away---the end of this month:
messages.messageBody:
Just a gentle reminder than the Live and Learn Unschooling Conference's
Early Bird deadline is approaching. It's only two weeks away---the end
of this month: June 30, 2006.

Funshop and scholarship requests are also due by the end of June.



~Kelly

Kelly Lovejoy
Conference Coordinator
Live and Learn Unschooling Conference
http://liveandlearnconference.org

"The hardest problem for the brain is not learning, but forgetting. No
matter how hard we try, we can't deliberately forget something we have
learned, and that is catastrophic if we learn that we can't learn."
~Frank Smith
